BaseCsvProfile.description: Default settings for all CSV files.

CompetitorCsvProfile.description: Specific profile for competitor data CSVs.

similar_keywords_v2.description: Profile for 'Similar Keywords' CSV files. Assumes a standard comma delimiter and potential encoding issues.

top_listings_title_first_v1.description: Profile for 'Top Listings' CSVs where the title is expected to be a primary field. Handles potential unnamed index column.

listings_title_first_v1.description: Profile for general 'Listings' CSVs. Similar to top_listings but may have different fields.
